name: 30 Floors to Freedom
description: Choose between three different characters to delve into a labyrinth of dungeons. You must explore 30 different floors to achieve your freedom. This game is in early access. Three dungeons are currently available to be played through. This is only a demo so there is no payment that needs to be made. When the game is finished it will be pay what you want. My gamejolt page in case you want to see in depth updates.
